reservation_about_your_rental_key_facts_: An overview of your rental terms:
reservation_about_your_rental_section_su: We want to eliminate any unwanted surprises for you when renting a car.
reservation_about_your_rental_rental_pol: A detailed look at your rental.
key_facts_intro_summary: This is a summary of the key facts you should know when hiring a vehicle, which will help you understand what will be included in your rental agreement.
key_facts_intro_rental_agreement: The rental agreement will be entered into at the time and place of vehicle hire between you and our affiliate or franchisee of the Enterprise Rent-A-Car brand that operates the branch location (referred to as “the Rental Company”) and will be governed by the law of the rental country. You should always read your rental agreement in full before signing it.
key_facts_included_protections_subtitle: Your rental agreement will include the following protection products:
key_facts_no_included_protections: Your rental does not include protection products.
key_facts_optional_bookable_protections_: You have the following optional protection products available for an additional charge:
key_facts_no_protections: There are no additional protection products available for your rental.
key_facts_included_equipment_subtitle: Your rental agreement will include the following equipment products:
key_facts_no_included_equipment: This rental does not include equipment products.
key_facts_optional_equipment_subtitle: You have the following optional equipment products available for an additional charge:
key_facts_no_equipment: There are no additional equipment products available for your rental.
key_facts_minimum_requirements_subtitle: Your rental will be subject to the following minimum requirements:
key_facts_no_minimum_requirements: There are no minimum requirements for your rental.
key_facts_additional_rental_policies_sub: Your rental will be subject to the following additional rental policies:
key_facts_no_additional_rental_policies: There are no additional rental policies for your rental.
key_facts_additional_liabilities_subtitl: You will be responsible for the following additional charges or liabilities if incurred:
key_facts_additional_liabilities_modific: Additional rental charges for changes you make to the booked rental vehicle, rental period or optional products
key_facts_additional_liabilities_damage_: Damages, theft or third-party liabilities not covered by a protection product
key_facts_additional_liabilities_fines_p: Any fines or penalty charges relating to the operation of the vehicle during your rental period, such as parking or speeding fines, plus reasonable administration charges
key_facts_additional_liabilities_legal_f: Any legal fees incurred collecting any payments due under the terms of the rental agreement
key_facts_additional_liabilities_collect: A reasonable collection fee if a vehicle is not returned to the original rental office
key_facts_additional_liabilities_cleanin: The cost of cleaning the vehicle if you return the vehicle in a dirty condition
key_facts_additional_liabilities_rental_: When you complete the rental agreement you will be required to present a valid credit or debit card as security for any charges incurred during your rental. Your signature on the rental agreement will pre-authorise the Rental Company to charge the card for future payments that become due. The Rental Company may also hold a deposit against these future liabilities - see Forms of Payment & Deposits.
key_facts_rules_of_the_road_traffic_laws: Your rental is subject to local traffic laws.
time_selection_return_close_time_details: The last return time indicates when this location closes. Please plan to return your vehicle at or before this time.
time_selection_pickup_close_time_details: The last pick-up time indicates when this location closes. Please plan to pick up your vehicle at or before this time.
key_facts_optional_non_bookable_protecti: You have the following optional protection products available for purchase at the time of pickup:
key_facts_damage_theft: Note - Unless you purchase a waiver or protection product or one is included in your reservation as specified below, to the extent permitted by the law applicable to your rental agreement, you are responsible to the Rental Company for theft or any damage to the vehicle during the full period of your vehicle hire. For rentals in most countries, you will be liable even if the accident was not your fault. If you are liable, your liability includes loss of revenue if the vehicle cannot be rented because it is damaged or stolen, a reasonable claims administration fee, diminishment of value, and any towing, storage or impound fees of the vehicle. Third-party liability protection is included in your reservation unless you have booked utilising an Account Number and third-party liability protection is specifically excluded via the associated Corporate Account agreement.
review_reservation_upgrade_text: Upgrade to the #{name} for only #{difference} more
key_facts_contact_information_branch: When you return the vehicle, we recommend that you are remain present until the vehicle is inspected by the Rental Company. You may have to wait during busy times. If there is any change in condition of the rental vehicle which exceeds normal wear and tear then this will be recorded by the Rental Company on a written post rental inspection report a copy of which will be provided to you.

rewards_learn_more_summary_plus_title: We've made it simple: dollars spent equals points earned.
rewards_learn_more_summary_description_t: Receive the rewards and appreciation that you deserve with the Enterprise Plus® program. Join today and start earning points that never expire.¹ Then redeem your points for free rental days — with no blackout dates² — at thousands of participating Enterprise locations worldwide.
rewards_learn_more_tip_footnote_one: ¹ With at least one qualifying Enterprise Plus program rental during every three-year period.
rewards_learn_more_tier_section_descript: Enterprise Plus has four tiers of recognition. Here's what it takes to achieve each tier, plus the benefits you’ll receive:
rewards_learn_more_tiers_plus_benefit: Membership is free. Earn points and elite status with every qualifying rental
rewards_learn_more_tiers_silver_benefit: 10% point bonus and 1 free vehicle class upgrade
rewards_learn_more_tiers_gold_benefit: 15% point bonus and 2 free vehicle class upgrades
rewards_learn_more_tiers_platinum_benefi: 20% point bonus and 4 free vehicle class upgrades
rewards_learn_more_tips_earn_free_rental: Redeem points toward free rental days
Enterprise Plus Points are redeemable for free rental days on any car, any day — with no blackout dates¹ — at thousands of participating Enterprise locations worldwide.
rewards_learn_more_tips_point_per_dollar: Earn one point per qualifying dollar spent
Enterprise Plus is a free membership reward program that allows you to earn points for every qualifying dollar¹ spent.

¹ "Qualifying U.S. dollars (USD) spent" is defined as time and mileage (base rate), paid vehicle class upgrades and additional extras (such as GPS, ski racks and car racks), less any discounts or credits; and excludes all taxes and surcharges, vehicle licence fees, airport-related fees, insurance costs, fuel purchase option and refuelling. Points will be rounded to the nearest U.S. dollar (USD). For rentals outside the United States, the currency will be converted into USD based on the exchange rate at the time of rental return.
rewards_learn_more_tips_redeem_title: Redeem with as few as 400 points
rewards_learn_more_tips_redeem_details: You can redeem for a free rental day with as few as 400 points. The amount of points required will vary based on the rental details you provide.
rewards_learn_more_tips_no_blackouts_det: As long as you have enough points, you can redeem points toward free rental days of available vehicles on enterprise.com, and pick up from thousands of participating Enterprise locations anywhere in the world.
rewards_learn_more_help_title: Want to learn more about Enterprise Plus? VIEW FAQS

rewards_welcome_earn_points_toward_free_: Earn points toward free rental days and elite status with every qualifying rental
about_points_redeeming_text: Just start a reservation and you can easily redeem points on the Review & Reserve step. Free rental days can be redeemed with as low as 400 points.
about_points_transfer_text: Transfer points to a friend or family member who is also an Enterprise Plus member. Points may be transferred once per year in 500 point increments, up to 7,500 points.
about_points_request_lost_message: Missing points? Submit a request below to inquire about the status of your points. Note, points often take up to a week to appear in your account.
about_e_p_earn_points_detail: Enterprise Plus members earn one point for every qualifying US dollar spent.* Silver, Gold and Platinum members earn more points when they rent.
about_e_p_redeem_points_detail: You can be on your way to a free rental day with as few as 400 points. The amount of points required will vary based on the rental details you provide.
about_e_p_transfer_points_detail: Transfer points to a friend or family member who is also an Enterprise Plus member. Points may be transferred once per year in 500 point increments, up to 7,500 points.
rewards_welcome_almost_gold_platinum_tie: Just #{days} more rental days until you reach the next tier
Just #{day} more rental day until you reach the next tier
rewards_welcome_tier_info_plural: You are now getting #{percent} bonus points* and #{number} free car upgrades
rewards_welcome_tier_info: You are now getting #{percent} bonus points* and #{number} free car upgrade
rewards_about_tier_members_bonus:
#{percent} bonus points* and
#{number} upgrade(s) per year
rentals_fallback_upcoming_text: You don't have any upcoming rentals
rentals_info_text: Past rental details are available 48 hours after the completion of your rental, and are available for six months.
rentals_fallback_past_text: You don't have any past rentals available
rentals_fallback_lookup_text: Sorry, we couldn't find a rental matching the provided information.
rentals_fallback_helper_text: Please double-check the confirmation number and last name you provided, or call us for assistance.
rentals_canceled_lookup_text: This reservation (confirmation number #{number}) has been cancelled.
rentals_canceled_lookup_helper_text: If the reservation you're trying to find was not cancelled, please double-check the confirmation number and last name you provided, or call us for assistance.
rentals_unauth_signin_text: Sign in to Enterprise Plus to access your rentals.
rentals_unauth_join_text: View upcoming, current and past rentals from your "My Rentals" dashboard. Plus, earn points toward elite status and free rental days along the way.
rentals_unauth_lookup_header: Need to find an existing reservation?
rentals_unauth_lookup_details: You can look up current and past rentals using your confirmation number.
info_modal_forgot_confirmation_details: We're here to help. If you've forgotten your confirmation number, or need further assistance, please call #{phone_number} Monday-Friday, between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. CT.
rentals_cannot_find_details: Some rentals can't be tracked in the app yet. If you don't see the rental you are looking for, please call us for assistance.
info_modal_delivery_collection_unmodifia: We're sorry, but this information can't be modified. If you'd like to edit this information, please cancel this reservation and rebook, or call us for assistance.
reservation_emerald_club_sign_in_title: Are you a National Emerald Club Member?
emerald_club_login_details: You can add your Emerald Club Account to this reservation to receive your corporate benefits and credit toward your tier status.
reservation_confirmation_emerald_club_ac: When your rental is complete you’ll earn credit toward your tier status and any applicable rental credits on your Emerald Club account.
alert_remove_emerald_club_message: Are you sure you want to remove your Emerald Club account? Your account will also be removed from future reservations.
emerald_login_add_account_subtitle: You can add your Emerald Club Account to this reservation to receive your corporate benefits and credit toward your tier status.
signout_emerald_club_confirmation_text: Are you sure you want to remove your Emerald Club account?
reservation_edit_confirmation_alert_titl: Are you sure you want to edit this reservation? Modifying your reservation will restart the reservation process from the point of the edit.
reservation_cancel_alert_title: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
reservation_confirmation_cancel_title: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
reservation_cancel_discard_confirm_messa: Are you sure you want to discard this reservation?
reservation_offbrand_alert_title: To view #{brand} rentals we need to leave the app and open your Web browser.
alert_open_browser_text: You are about to leave the app
reachability_title: Sorry, we're having some network trouble.
reachability_details: We're sorry, but it looks like either our services are temporarily offline or you are not connected to the internet. Please check your connection or try again later.
error_service_unavailable: We're sorry, but it looks like either our services are temporarily offline or you are not connected to the internet. Please check your connection or try again later.
sign_up_confirmation_text: To join Enterprise Plus, you will need to leave the app and be redirected to our Web site.
alert_one_way_reservation_text: We're sorry, but a one-way reservation is unavailable from this location. Please try a different location or continue as a roundtrip reservation
get_directions_action_title: Would you like to be directed to Maps?
location_services_denied_7_error: Location services for this app are disabled. You can enable them in Settings > Privacy > Location Services
location_services_denied_error: Location services are disabled, please enable them in settings to continue.
location_services_generic_error: Sorry, but we seem to be having some network issues. Please try again later.
web_bookable_alert_description: We're sorry, but this location is only bookable online. To rent from this location we need to leave the app and open your Web browser.
call_location_alert_title: Please call us to rent from this location.
error_no_app_found: We're sorry, but no app is available to complete this action.
dashboard_google_maps_not_found: We're sorry, but we can't connect to Google Maps right now. Please try again later.
preferred_currency_dialog_text: This will determine how you'll see prices throughout the app.
alert_service_error_invalid_api_key_mess: We’ve updated our app to make it better. Please visit the app store to download our newest version
dashboard_data_tracking_notification: Data tracking is currently turned on. You can adjust this preference in the app settings.
ecars_reservation_modify_call_prompt_mes: Sorry, but we can't modify this reservation right now. Please cancel the reservation and rebook, or call us for assistance.
prepay_reservation_modify_call_prompt_me: Sorry, but modifying a pre-paid reservation is not supported yet in the app. We are working on adding this ability soon. Until then, please visit our website to modify this reservation.
notifications_current_rental_alert_messa: Hi #{name}, your reservation is almost over. Be sure to return your vehicle to #{location-name} on #{time}.
notifications_upcoming_rental_alert_mess: See you soon, #{name}! Your vehicle will be ready for pickup at #{location-name} on #{time}.
notification_prompt_content: Turn on notifications to get custom alerts and enable location access for real-time information from the Enterprise Rental Assistant.
notification_prompt_title: Stay On Top Of Your Rental With Notifications & Location Access
settings_privacy_row_auto_save_detail_ti: Enabling this option will give the app permission to save your e-mail address, first and last name, and phone number to use for future reservations.
settings_privacy_row_data_collection_tit: Collect Mobile Analytics & App Usage Data
settings_clear_data_confirmation_details: Are you sure you want to clear your personal data? If so, your first name, last name, e-mail address and phone number will be deleted from this app.
settings_privacy_data_collection_modal_t: About Collecting Mobile Analytics and App Usage Data
settings_privacy_data_collection_modal_c: We use mobile analytics software to better understand the functionality of our mobile software on your phone. This software might record information, such as: how often you use the application, the events that occur within the application, aggregated use, performance data and where the application was downloaded from. If you activate this feature, we will link the mobile analytics data as mentioned above with the personal information you provided in the app. If you have opted-in to our emails, linking the data will allow us to provide you with more relevant content and offers.
settings_privacy_save_history_modal_cont: We save your search history in order to make it easier and more efficient to make reservations, and access locations that are of interest to you and your travel needs.
settings_privacy_clear_data_modal_conten: To help you make reservations easier and more efficient, your first and last name, e-mail address and phone number are automatically saved by the app. Tap "Clear Personal Data" to delete this information.
settings_item_text_return_notification: Remind me to return my vehicle
settings_item_text_pickup_notification: Remind me to pick up my vehicle
rental_assistant_modal_text: This feature can recognize when you're near the Enterprise location associated with your reservation, and provide you with helpful information so you can have an even better rental experience.
location_services_always_denied_error: Enterprise Rental Assistant requires location access settings for Enterprise to be set to "Always."
notifications_wayfinding_alert_message: Welcome to #{name}. Do you need help finding our local Enterprise Branch?
notifications_after_hours_alert_message: Welcome back. It looks like you're returning your vehicle after regular office hours. Please follow our return instructions to return your vehicle safely.
notification_settings_rental_assistant_d: This feature can recognize when you are near the Enterprise location(s) associated your reservation and provide you with helpful information so you can have an even better rental experience.
settings_security_row_touch_id_detail_ti: Use Touch ID to sign in to your Enterprise Plus account.
profile_fingerprint_unlock_info_message: Enabling this feature allows you to use your fingerprint to unlock your Enterprise Plus account to edit profile details.
modal_analytics_reminder_details: You have enabled data collection for this app. We use this information to better understand how well our app works across different mobile devices. You can continue to allow data collection by tapping "Continue" or update privacy settings from App Settings.
welcome_screen_content: Sign in to your Enterprise Plus® account to access your rentals, plus earn points towards elite status and free rental days along the way.
dashboard_history_cell_disabled_details: For quicker reservations, turn your history tracking on to see your recent activity, like past searches and rentals or favourite locations.
dashboard_history_cell_enabled_details: We want to make reserving a rental car super easy for you. We'll save your recent activity here, like past searches and rentals or favourite locations, to make future reservations even quicker.
dashboard_clear_quickstart_alert_details: Are you sure you want to clear your recent history? (Your favourite locations will not be removed.)
locations_confirm_delete_recents_message: Are you sure you want to clear your recent history? (Your favourite locations will not be removed.)
call_support_modal_title: Who do you want to call?
dashboard_extend_rental_details: Need more time on the road? We're happy to help. Please call us to extend your time.
time_selection_after_hours_details: Please review our After-Hours policy for instructions on how to return your rental outside our usual business hours.
call_support_roadside_assistance_button_: For problems while on the road
dashboard_loyalty_cell_title: Earn points and make reservations even faster
signout_confirmation_text: Are you sure you want to sign out of your Enterprise Plus account?
customer_support_eplus_details: For help with our loyalty program
customer_support_disabilities_details: For help with extra accommodations to meet your needs
customer_support_send_message_details: For questions and feedback, e-mail us
customer_support_search_answers_details: Search our collection of frequently asked questions and their answers.
dashboard_loyalty_prompt_cell_title: Not an Enterprise Plus member yet?
dashboard_loyalty_prompt_cell_details: You could be earning points toward free rentals days.
alert_calling_unavailable_text: Sorry, this device doesn't support making phone calls.
region_dialog_text: Please verify your country of residence. This selection will determine how you'll see prices throughout the app.
dashboard_permission_prompt_message: To gain the full benefits of this app, enable notifications and allow us to use your location.
dashboard_permission_prompt_title: Stay Up to Date About Your Rentals
dashboard_call_support_text: We're available to help with your questions and feedback.
location_services_always_usage_descripti: We use this information to show you nearby Enterprise locations and assist you with your rental pickup and return.
location_services_when_in_use_descriptio: We use this information to show you nearby Enterprise locations.
weekend_special_educational_dialog_title: Weekend Special now available in the app!
weekend_special_educational_dialog_subti: Get a great rental deal for all your weekend travel needs.
confirmation_rating_subtitle: We sure hope so! Your feedback will help us better serve all our customers. Do you mind rating us in the App Store?
